SignIn.meta_description: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.

SignUp.meta_description: Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.

PrivacyPolicy.meta_description: Learn how CV Mater collects, uses, and protects your personal information. Read our Privacy Policy to understand your rights and how we ensure data privacy and security.
PrivacyPolicy.introduction_content_1: Welcome to CV Mate. We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our service.
PrivacyPolicy.introduction_content_2: By using our service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.
PrivacyPolicy.information_we_collect_content_1: We collect several types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our service to you:
PrivacyPolicy.information_we_collect_content_2: Personal Data: Name, email address, phone number, professional history.
PrivacyPolicy.information_we_collect_content_3: Usage Data: Information on how you use our service.
PrivacyPolicy.information_we_collect_content_4: Cookies and Tracking Data: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies.
PrivacyPolicy.how_we_use_your_information_content_1: We use the collected data for various purposes:
PrivacyPolicy.how_we_use_your_information_content_2: To provide and maintain our service.
PrivacyPolicy.how_we_use_your_information_content_3: To notify you about changes to our service.
PrivacyPolicy.how_we_use_your_information_content_5: To gather analysis or valuable information so that we can improve our service.
PrivacyPolicy.how_we_use_your_information_content_6: To monitor the usage of our service.
PrivacyPolicy.how_we_use_your_information_content_7: To detect, prevent and address technical issues.
PrivacyPolicy.blockchain_and_data_storage_content: Our service utilizes blockchain technology for CV verification. Please note that information stored on a blockchain is immutable and         cannot be deleted. We take care to store only necessary verification data on the blockchain, while keeping your detailed personal information off-chain.
PrivacyPolicy.data_security_content: The security of your data is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
PrivacyPolicy.your_data_protection_rights_content_1: We aim to take reasonable steps to allow you to correct, amend, delete, or limit the use of your Personal Data. If you wish to be informed what Personal Data we hold about you and if you want it to be removed from our systems, please contact us.
PrivacyPolicy.your_data_protection_rights_content_2: In certain circumstances, you have the following data protection rights:
PrivacyPolicy.your_data_protection_rights_content_3: The right to access, update or to delete the information we have on you.
PrivacyPolicy.changes_to_this_privacy_policy_content_1: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "effective date" at the top of this Privacy Policy.
PrivacyPolicy.changes_to_this_privacy_policy_content_2: You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.
PrivacyPolicy.contact_us_content_1: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

TermsOfService.meta_description: Review the terms and conditions governing your use of CV Mate’s services, including important information about user responsibilities, rights, and limitations
TermsOfService.acceptance_of_terms_content: By accessing or using the CV Mate service, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you may not use our service.
TermsOfService.description_of_service_content: CV Mate provides an AI-powered CV generation and blockchain verification service. Our service uses machine learning algorithms to create and optimize your CV, and blockchain technology to verify and secure your professional information.
TermsOfService.user_accounts_content: To use certain features of our service, you may be required to create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password. You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account.
TermsOfService.user_content_content_1: You retain all rights to the content you submit to our service. By submitting content, you grant CV Mate a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, and display your content in connection with providing and improving our service.
TermsOfService.user_content_content_2: You are solely responsible for the content you submit. You agree not to submit any false, misleading, or fraudulent information.
TermsOfService.intellectual_property_content: The CV Mate service, including its original content, features, and functionality, is owned by CV Mate and is protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.
TermsOfService.blockchain_verification_content: Our service uses blockchain technology to verify certain aspects of your CV. You understand and agree that information stored on a blockchain is immutable and cannot be deleted. We will only store necessary verification data on the blockchain, not your complete CV or detailed personal information.
TermsOfService.ai_generated_content_content: Our service uses AI to generate and optimize CV content. While we strive for accuracy, you are responsible for reviewing and ensuring the accuracy of all AI-generated content before using it. We do not guarantee that AI-generated content will be error-free or suitable for all purposes.
TermsOfService.limitation_of_liability_content: CV Mate shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from your access to or use of or inability to access or use the service.
TermsOfService.modifications_to_service_content: We reserve the right to modify or discontinue, temporarily or permanently, the service (or any part thereof) with or without notice. We shall not be liable to you or to any third party for any modification, price change, suspension or discontinuance of the service.
TermsOfService.governing_law_content: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the United Kingdom, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
TermsOfService.changes_to_terms_content: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material we will try to provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect.
TermsOfService.contact_us_content_1: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us:

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.question_1_title: How does the AI generate CV content?
FAQ.question_1_content: Our AI analyzes your input, industry trends, and job market data to create tailored, professional content for your CV.
FAQ.question_2_title: Is my data secure with blockchain verification?
FAQ.question_2_content: Yes, blockchain technology ensures that your CV data is securely stored and verifiable, protecting against unauthorized changes.
FAQ.question_3_title: Can I edit the AI-generated content?
FAQ.question_3_content: While our AI provides a strong foundation, you have full control to edit and personalize your CV content.
FAQ.question_4_title: How often can I update my CV?
FAQ.question_4_content: You can update your CV as often as you like. Our system allows for real-time updates and continuous improvement of your profile.
FAQ.question_5_title: Is CV Mate compatible with Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS)?
FAQ.question_5_content: Yes, our AI is trained to optimize your CV for ATS, increasing your chances of getting past initial screening processes.

Features.title: Powerful Features
Features.feature_1_description: Our ML algorithms create tailored content based on your experience and industry trends.
Features.feature_2_description: Ensure the authenticity of your CV with our blockchain-based verification system.
Features.feature_3_description: Your CV evolves with you, automatically updating as you gain new skills and experiences.
Features.feature_4_description: Generate your CV in various formats, from traditional PDFs to interactive web profiles.
Features.feature_5_description: Our AI ensures your CV is optimized for Applicant Tracking Systems, increasing your chances of getting noticed.
Features.feature_6_description: Receive personalized recommendations on skills to acquire based on your career goals.

HeroSection.content_3: Create, Validate, and Securely Share Your Resume

Testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
Testimonials.testimonial_1_content: CV Mate helped me land my dream job. The AI-generated content was spot-on!
Testimonials.testimonial_2_content: The blockchain verification feature gave me an edge in a competitive job market
Testimonials.testimonial_3_content: The skill gap analysis provided invaluable insights for my career development

StellarConnectCard.connect_to_wallet_description: Securely connect your Stellar wallet to access blockchain features

CVGenerator.title: Generate your CV
CVGenerator.generated_document_placeholder: Your generated document will appear here...

ProfileAbout.headline: Professional Headline
ProfileAbout.about_validation: About must be at least 10 characters long

ProfileExperience.title: Title
ProfileExperience.title_validation_1: Title must be at least 2 characters long
ProfileExperience.company_validation_1: Company name must be at least 2 characters long
ProfileExperience.description_hint: List experiences in reverse chronological order (most recent experiences on top and least recent on bottom). Explain the duties, role in organisation, describing the difference you made in the position. Use action verbs at the beginning of each statement. Describe what you accomplished in your position and give numbers indicating achievements. Note that relevant interests and skills can also be demonstrated through campus and volunteer activities
ProfileExperience.location_validation_1: Location must be at least 2 characters long
ProfileExperience.experience_validation: At least one experience is required

ProfileEducation.grade_placeholder: May include GCSEs, grades or academic honours (e.g., First Class, 2:1, GPA 3.8)
ProfileEducation.grade_hint: Do not list if below a 2:1. If still studying; state predicted grade OR grade achieved to date
ProfileEducation.description_placeholder: Specify relevant coursework, industry-related courses, thesis topic, or fieldwork experience

ProfileSkills.placeholder: e.g., Computer: Proficient in Microsoft Office, Programming Languages, Technical Tools
ProfileSkills.skills_validation: At least one skill is required

ProfileLanguages.language_validation_2: Language must be less than 50 characters
